attributes.action: help strengthen governance in mosques, extending citizenship education in madrasas, and measures to boost civic and theological leadership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government ought to set out clear guidelines for Islamic places of worship to tackle extremism and boost civic and theological leadership. Furthermore, ensure there are a wide range of facilities, activities and provision delivered at the mosque for the local Muslim and non-Muslim communities. If not, to cut funding immediately to those places of worship.
